hero.description: AI Engineer | Website Development | UI/UX Design Enthusiast and coding the future

about.title: AI Research, Developer, Designer, and Innovator
about.intro: Hello! I'm Dimas Tri Mulyo, an AI Engineer with expertise in web development. I am passionate about integrating artificial intelligence to create innovative and user-friendly web solutions.
about.focus: My focus is on making web development faster and more accessible. As an AI Engineer, I'm now expanding into backend development to grow as a full-stack developer, enabling me to build seamless, robust, and intelligent web applications from end-to-end.
about.quote: I was reminded of what is perhaps the fundamental rule of technological progress: if something can be done, it probably will be done, and possibly already has been.
